short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's easy to add new hires into your payroll/hris system directly from this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a way to connect your HR cloud?

The RecruitPro Extension for Google Chrome allows you to instantly connect all your HR systems, giving you access to all your hiring information from RecruitPro.

With this extension you will avoid that painful process of having multiple integrating each system one by one or even worse, logging into multiple systems. It allows you to be integrated with 100's of different HR systems and services immediately.

How does it work?

The RecruitPro extension will automatically pull the last employees hired on your company from RecruitPro with all the necessary hiring information all within one area! Then you can map the forms on your Payroll/HRIS system to let the extension know where you want each field to be placed so you won't have to manually type in all the information.

Where does it work?

RecruitPro works on top of any software that is accessed through Google Chrome!
